summary:
### **Substantial Holder Notice Summary – Yari Minerals Limited (ASX: YARI)**  

- **Holder 1:** TAKA Custodians Pty Ltd  
  - **Stake Acquired:** 8.94% (61,660,313 ordinary shares)  
  - **Acquisition Dates & Consideration:**  
    - 19/5/2025: 21,698,541 shares ($108,492.71 cash)  
    - 18/7/2025: 14,157,166 shares ($70,785.83 cash)  
    - 18/7/2025: 25,804,605 shares ($129,023.02 cash)  

- **Holder 2:** Reid Machine Pty Ltd  
  - **Stake Acquired:** 8.94% (61,660,313 ordinary shares)  
  - **Acquisition Dates & Consideration:**  
    - 19/5/2025: 21,698,541 shares ($108,492.71 cash)  
    - 18/7/2025: 14,157,166 shares ($70,785.83 cash)  
    - 18/7/2025: 25,804,605 shares ($129,023.02 cash)  

**Key Implication:**  
- Two new substantial holders collectively acquired **~17.88%** of YARI’s shares, indicating significant ownership changes.
